com.foreach.across.modules.filemanager.business

Interface FileResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FileRepositoryResource, org.springframework.core.io.InputStreamSource, org.springframework.core.io.Resource, org.springframework.core.io.WritableResource
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExpiringFileResource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AzureFileResource, CachedFileResource, ExpiringFileRepository.TrackedResource, SpringIntegrationFileResource, SpringIntegrationFtpFileResource, SpringIntegrationSftpFileResource

    public interface FileResource
extends org.springframework.core.io.WritableResource, FileRepositoryResource
    Represents a single FileRepository file, identified by a FileDescriptor. Can be used to read or manipulate the file (including update and delete).
    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  FileResource.TargetFile
      Additional interface that FileResource types can implement to provide access to the underlying physical File.

        Returns:
        the descriptor to this file resource

      • getFolderResource

        FolderResource getFolderResource()
        Returns:
        the folder to which this file belongs

      • getFile

        default File getFile()
        Method getFile() is extended from Resource but it's advised not to implement it directly on FileResource to ensure better active management of physical files. Use either InputStreamSource.getInputStream() to get the data of the resource, or copyTo(File) if you require it as a physical file.
        Specified by:
        getFile in interface org.springframework.core.io.Resource
        See Also:
        InputStreamSource.getInputStream(), copyTo(File)

      • delete

        boolean delete()
        Delete the actual file. The return code should give an indication if delete has failed or not. Whereas true might not guarantee that a file has been deleted, false should guarantee that delete has failed.

        If delete was successful, subsequent calls to Resource.exists() should return false.

        Returns:
        false if delete failed

      • createRelative

        FileResource createRelative(String relativePath)
        Specified by:
        createRelative in interface org.springframework.core.io.Resource

      • copyFrom

        default void copyFrom(@NonNull
                      @NonNull File originalFile,
                      boolean deleteOriginal)
               throws IOException
        Copy the file data from a physical file into this resource. Optionally deleting the physical file when done (useful for temporary files).
        Parameters:
        originalFile - data to copy
        deleteOriginal - true if the original file should be deleted when copy is done
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown in case of IO error or resource not found

      • copyFrom

        default void copyFrom(@NonNull
                      @NonNull FileResource originalFileResource,
                      boolean deleteOriginal)
               throws IOException
        Copy the file data from another file resource into this resource. Optionally deletes the original file resource when done (useful for temporary files).
        Parameters:
        originalFileResource - whose data to copy
        deleteOriginal - true if the original file resources should be deleted when copy is done
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown in case of IO error or resource not found

      • copyFrom

        default void copyFrom(@NonNull
                      @NonNull org.springframework.core.io.Resource resource)
               throws IOException
        Copy the data of any type of Resource into this file resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - whose data to copy
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown in case of IO error or resource not found

      • copyFrom

        default void copyFrom(@NonNull
                      @NonNull InputStream inputStream)
               throws IOException
        Copy the data from the input stream into this resource. The caller is responsible for correctly closing the input stream.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - data to copy
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown in case of IO error or resource not found

      • copyTo

        default void copyTo(@NonNull
                    @NonNull File file)
             throws IOException
        Copy the data from this file resource to the physical file specified. If the file already exists, it will be removed, and any subdirectories that do not yet exist will be created.
        Parameters:
        file - to copy the data to
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown in case of IO error or resource not found

      • copyTo

        default void copyTo(@NonNull
                    @NonNull org.springframework.core.io.WritableResource targetResource)
             throws IOException
        Copy the data from this file resource to another.
        Parameters:
        targetResource - to copy the data toestLocalFile
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown in case of IO error or resource not found

      • copyTo

        default void copyTo(@NonNull
                    @NonNull OutputStream outputStream)
             throws IOException
        Copy the data from this file resource to the output stream specified. Opening and closing the output stream is the responsibility of the caller.
        Parameters:
        outputStream - to copy the data to
        Throws:
        IOException - thrown in case of IO error or resource not found
